attributes.action: Standardize high street clothes sizes for women
attributes.background: I'm sure most of you have been clothes shopping and realised that in one store you are a size 12 but in another you are a size 18! Why can't high street stores agree on sizes? Standardized sizing should be implemented in high street stores and maybe we can improve body confidence in young girls.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on high street stores, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
